another language.

a solemn promise made to a deity, saint, etc. committing oneself to an act, service or condition; a vow.
an oral or written agreement to do or not to do something; a promise or vow.

ಭಾಷೆಯಿಡು bhāṣeyiḍu to take an oath; to make a solemn promise; ಭಾಷೆ ಮುಟ್ಟಿಸು bhāṣe muṭṭisu = ಭಾಷೆಯನ್ನು ಪಾಲಿಸು; ಭಾಷೆಗೆ ತಪ್ಪು bhāṣege tappu to break one's promise; to violate one's vow; ಭಾಷೆಯನ್ನು ಪಾಲಿಸು bhāṣeyannu pālisu to fulfil one's promise; to accomplish one's vow; ಭಾಷೆಯನ್ನು ನೀಗು bhāṣeyannu nīgu = ಭಾಷೆಗೆ ತಪ್ಪು.

to break one's promise; to deliberately fail to fulfil one's promise.

a solid, nonmetallic, poisonous chemical element existing in three allotropic forms (a) yellow, poisonous, flammable, and luminous in the dark, b) red, less poisonous, and less flammable, and c) black, insoluble in most solvents, and the least flammable) (symbol P., at. wt. 30.9738); phosphorus.
